it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.server.match

Class ServerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.server.match.ServerView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerViewInterface, java.rmi.Remote, java.util.Observer

    public class ServerView
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer, ServerViewInterface
    Class that represents a single match. It is used to implements a Model-View-Controller pattern in the server, even if there is a network between the real view and the server. This class manage both Remote Method Invocation (RMI) and Socket connections, and it is used to hide the complexity of the network management from the Controller and Model
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari

      • ServerView

        public ServerView()
        Constructor of the ServerView. All ServerView uses a static index to know the correct ServerView to pass to RMI connections

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        public java.lang.String getID()
        Method used to get the ID of the current ServerView for RMI connections
        Returns:
        The ID of the ServerView

      • addConnection

        public void addConnection(Connection connection,
                          java.lang.String playerID)
                   throws ElementNotFoundException
        Method used to add a player to this ServerView. This method also re-add a disconnected player if he is in this match
        Parameters:
        connection - The Connection class that represents a Socket connection
        playerID - The player's ID to connect to this ServerView
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException - Thrown if the player isn't found in the current view. It is necessary to reconnect the correct player

      • connect

        private void connect(Connection connection,
                     java.lang.String playerID)
        Method used to add a connection like observer of this ServerView and to registry the connection in the Map
        Parameters:
        connection - The connection to add to this ServerView
        playerID - The ID used to know who is the correct player associated to the connection

      • search

        private int search(java.lang.String playerID)
            throws ElementNotFoundException
        Private method used to search a disconnected player in this ServerView
        Parameters:
        playerID - The player's ID to search
        Returns:
        The index of the player if it is found
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException - Thrown if the player isn't found

      • wasConnected

        public boolean wasConnected(java.lang.String playerID)
        Method used to know if a player was connected to this ServerView before
        Parameters:
        playerID - The player's ID to search
        Returns:
        True if the disconnected players list contains the specify ID, False otherwise

      • nameNotUsed

        public boolean nameNotUsed(java.lang.String playerID)
        Method used to know if the ID isn't used yet
        Parameters:
        playerID - The ID to check
        Returns:
        True if the ID isn't used before, otherwise False

      • getNumberOfPlayers

        public int getNumberOfPlayers()
        Method used to know how many players are in this ServerView
        Returns:
        The current number of player in this ServerView

      • run

        public void run()
         throws NotEnoughPlayersException,
                GameLogicError,
                java.io.IOException
        Method used to run the ServerView class and start a match
        Throws:
        NotEnoughPlayersException - Thrown if there isn't enough players in this ServerView (current players < 2)
        GameLogicError - Thrown if there is a problem with the GameLogic
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is a network error

      • sendPlayersList

        private void sendPlayersList()
        Private method used to send to the client the list of players that are playing in this match

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable sender,
                   java.lang.Object messageToSend)
        Method used when this ServerView received a message from the GameLogic to send to the Client and vice-versa
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer

      • sendAll

        private void sendAll(GenericMessage message)
        Method used to send a message to all the connected players
        Parameters:
        message - The GenericMessage to send to the Client

        Parameters:
        playerID - The player's ID to disconnect from this ServerVIew

                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to connect a RMI Client to this ServerView
        Specified by:
        connectToServerView in interface ServerViewInterface
        Parameters:
        client - The ClientInterface to add to the ServerView
        playerID - The chosen player's ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a network error
